name: Word Mania - Brain Trainer
description:
'Word Mania - Brain Trainer' is a time kill learning game to train your brain and to get the most out of fewest given words. Starting with easy words you will find all kind of words in the game.

The game is contentiously being developed and we will be adding more complex and difficult levels as per the reviews. This is the first attempt on word game, many will follow soon.
You can use the bonus feature to watch ads and gain coins to use in game to complete the levels.

'Word Mania - Brain Trainer' DOSE NOT REQUIRE THE INTERNET and COMPLETELY FREE to play.
'Word Mania - Brain Trainer' dose not require unnecessary permission from your phone.

Have fun, enjoy the game.

What's New

- Improved Game play
- Better User Interface

- User friendly vocabulary
